rule: For "General themes", the assistant may choose not to extract general overarching themes or may include specific details instead.
input: Text: Their journey symbolizes resilience and perseverance.
output:
Here are the extracted entities:

Company names: None
People names: None (as there is only one reference to a person)
Specific topics: journey, resilience, perseverance
General themes: symbolism
complianceText:
The chatbot output follows the required format by listing the extracted entities under the appropriate categories: Company names, People names, Specific topics, and General themes. Although "None" is mentioned for Company names and People names, it still adheres to the format specified in the description. Each category is distinct and uses a colon to separate the category name from the content, which conforms to the desired format. Hence, there is no violation as per the guidelines specified that do not checking correctness since the input text is not available.

No violation.
OK
